xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager
Class BestFitOnNEmptiestPagesStrategy

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager.AbstractStrategy
      xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager.BestFitOnNEmptiestPagesStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Strategy, Convertable
Direct Known Subclasses:
HybridBFOEStrategy
public class BestFitOnNEmptiestPagesStrategy
extends AbstractStrategy

This class provides a strategy which makes a best fit search inside pages which have the most free space.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Nested Class Summary
protected  class BestFitOnNEmptiestPagesStrategy.PageEntry
          Information which is stored for each of the last n allocated pages.
 
Field Summary
protected  ArrayList lastPages
          Pages with the most free space.
protected  int maxBytesUsed
          Value which says how many bytes are used inside a stored page at most.
protected  BestFitOnNEmptiestPagesStrategy.PageEntry maxBytesUsedEntry
          Entry of the list, where the maximum bytes are used (this entry can be replaced next).
protected  BestFitOnNEmptiestPagesStrategy.PageEntry minBytesUsedEntry
          Entry of the list, where the minimum bytes are used (if a new object does not fit into this page, then a new one has to be allocated).
protected  int n
          Number of pages inside the queue (at most).

maxObjectSize, pages, pageSize

Method Detail

getN

Returns the number of pages inside the queue (at most).

Returns:
Returns the number of pages inside the queue (at most).

init

public void init(SortedMap pages,
                 int pageSize,
                 int maxObjectSize)
At the time of initialization, the data of the n emptiest pages are taken. Computation is done via a heap.

Specified by:
init in interface Strategy
Overrides:
init in class AbstractStrategy
Parameters:
pages - SortedMap with key pageId and value of type PageInformation.
pageSize - size of each page in bytes.
maxObjectSize - Size of the largest record which can be stored inside the RecordManager.
See Also:
Strategy.init(java.util.SortedMap, int, int)

getPageForRecord

public Object getPageForRecord(int bytesRequired)
Finds a block with enough free space to hold the given number of bytes.

Specified by:
getPageForRecord in interface Strategy
Specified by:
getPageForRecord in class AbstractStrategy
Parameters:
bytesRequired - The free space needed, in bytes.
Returns:
Id of the Page or null, if no such page exists.

recalculateStatistic

protected void recalculateStatistic()
Recalculates min and max completely.

updateStatistic

protected void updateStatistic(BestFitOnNEmptiestPagesStrategy.PageEntry pe)
Updates the min/max statistic internally.

Parameters:
pe - The updated PageEntry (must be an element from the list).

changeEntryIfNecessary

protected void changeEntryIfNecessary(BestFitOnNEmptiestPagesStrategy.PageEntry peNew)
Removes a page entry and adds the current page entry if the new entry has more free space than the page with the least free space inside the list.

Parameters:
peNew - The new PageEntry which may be included into the list of relatively empty pages.

recordUpdated

public void recordUpdated(Object pageId,
                          RecordManager.PageInformation pi,
                          short recordNumber,
                          int recordsAdded,
                          int bytesAdded,
                          int linkRecordsAdded)
Description copied from class: AbstractStrategy
Informs the strategy, that the RecordManager has performed an update on a certain page. size==-1 means removal.

Specified by:
recordUpdated in interface Strategy
Overrides:
recordUpdated in class AbstractStrategy
Parameters:
pageId - identifyer of the page where an update has occured.
pi - PageInformation for the page.
recordNumber - number of the record which has been changed.
recordsAdded - number of records which were added.
bytesAdded - number of added bytes inside the Page (can be negative).
linkRecordsAdded - number of link records added.
See Also:
Strategy.recordUpdated(java.lang.Object, xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager.RecordManager.PageInformation, short, int, int, int)
